name: We Flew Over 8000 MILES to Fly on This Plane!
description:
Thanks to Keeps for sponsoring this video! Head to https://keeps.com/noelphilips to get 50% off your first order of hair loss treatment.

I flew over 8000 miles to Zimbabwe to join my good friend @JoshCahill on a quest to fly on a super rare aircraft. It didn’t exactly go to plan…

SUBSCRIBE TO JOSH: https://www.youtube.com/c/JoshCahill

OFFICIAL NOEL MERCH: www.noelphilips.com
